Validate a Data Frame for LCMD Imputation

check_dataframe_validity.Rd

Ensures the input is a data frame with at least 1 column, 2 rows, and that all columns are numeric.

Usage

check_dataframe_validity(df)

Arguments

df

An object to be validated.

Value

TRUE if the input passes all checks; otherwise throws an error.

On this page
